quotes.quote: The best swimmers are the ones that almost don't try the most… It's just about relaxing and enjoying it.
quotes.author: Cate Campbell

quotes.quote: Traveling to swimming meets took me beyond my small-town existence, gave me a hint of the exciting world outside of my own home.
quotes.author: Esther Williams

quotes.quote: Never worry about what anyone else is doing… Just swim your own race.
quotes.author: Dara Torres

quotes.quote: Swimming is normal for me. I'm relaxed. I'm comfortable, and I know my surroundings. It's my home.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.quote: I've enjoyed training again, I've enjoyed pushing myself in the pool and I'll keep on swimming until I feel I cannot get any more out of myself.
quotes.author: Ian Thorpe

quotes.quote: Swimming is great because there are levels of goals. First, when I was four, it was making it to the other end and overcoming the fear of standing up in front of everybody at a swim meet because I was such a shy kid.
quotes.author: Summer Sanders

quotes.quote: I can't imagine what I would be doing if I wasn't swimming. It is what I want to do now; it is what I want to do in the foreseeable future, and that is what I'm focusing on.
quotes.author: Cate Campbell

quotes.quote: It's a beautiful thing, diving into the cool crisp water and then just sort of being able to pull your body through the water and the water opening up for you.
quotes.author: Dawn Fraser

quotes.quote: Swimming is all about having fun, and I am a firm believer that you should keep swimming as long as you are having fun.
quotes.author: Scott Goldblatt

quotes.quote: Swimming is one of the best exercises for children. It engages almost every muscle in the body and is fun to do!
quotes.author: Jack LaLanne

quotes.quote: The water is your friend. You don't have to fight with water; just share the same spirit as the water, and it will help you move.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Popov

quotes.quote: Learning to swim at a young age teaches children about discipline, persistence, and the rewards of hard work.
quotes.author: Us

badQuotes.quotesIIgnore: The most important lesson I've learned from sports is how to be not only a gracious winner, but a good loser as well. Not everyone wins all the time, as a matter of fact, no one wins all the time. Winning is the easy part, losing is really tough. But, you learn more from one loss than you do from a million wins. You learn a lot about sportsmanship.
badQuotes.author: Amy Van Dyken

badQuotes.quotesIIgnore: Mainly, I like to have fun. Swimming is all about having fun, and I am a firm believer that you should keep swimming as long as you are having fun, but I can say that it becomes much more fun as you get older and learn more about the sport, life, and especially more about yourself.
badQuotes.author: Scott Goldblatt
